thread.title: Victor Garber marries partner Rainer Andreesen
thread.title_full: Victor Garber marries partner Rainer Andreesen | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Victor Garber marries partner Rainer Andreesen
text:
Actor Victor Garber has tied the knot with his longtime partner Rainer Andreesen in Canada. Andreesen, an artist, took to Instagram over the weekend to share the exciting-yet-surprising news with a sweet snap of them laughing together in black suits, reported Aceshowbiz.
Andreesen captioned the photo, “YES WE DID!” and puts the hashtags #justgotmarried #elopedintofino #canada @therealvictorgarber #after16years.
The newlyweds looked well-groomed in the said snap. Garber put his arm around Andreesen’s hip while the artist put his hand on the actor’s shoulder.
The 66-year-old “Titanic” actor wore black ensembles, showing his elegance, for the occasion. Andreesen, meanwhile, opted for a white shirt and gray striped tie topped with black suit.
Both of them gave little information about their wedding.
Days after Andreesen’s post, the actor posted on his Instagram page a photo of them during the nuptials.
In the said photo, the two were all smiles in front of a supposed lady who officiated their wedding. “Wickaninnish Inn Tofino BC magical place to tie the knot. @rainerarts,” read the caption.
The newlyweds received congratulatory messages from their fellow celebrities.
Andy Cohen wrote, “OH MY GOD! Much love to you both!!! Mazels all around! Kiss Vic for me!!!” Similarly, Rosie O’Donnell said, “Congrats to you two talented handsome men !!!!” Actor Greg Rikaart wrote, “HUGE congrats, @rainearts @therealvictorgarber.”
 10:51 am
